quote: Not only did I lie about lying, but I lied about lying about lying. And you’d better believe that’s the truth.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.

quote: You can't lie to your soul.
author: Irvine Welsh,  Porno

quote: Lie to me. Just to console my soul.
author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense

quote: A lie never grows old.
author: Sophocles,  White Lies

quote: I lie to myself all the time. But I never believe me.
author: S.E. Hinton,  The Outsiders

quote: Eyes shows lies.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Life is real, and you canot live a lie.
author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

quote: Lies are neither bad nor good. Like a fire they can either keep you warm or burn you to death, depending on how they're used.
author: Max Brooks,  World War Z: An Oral History of the Zombie War

quote: Ask us no questions and we’ll tell you no lies.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: I always tell the truth. Even when I lie.
author: Al Pacino

quote: Lies vs. Truth [10w] I can only speak truth if I lie to myself.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Lying is easy. But it's lonely.""What do you mean?""When you lie to everyone about everything, what's left? What's true?""Nothing,"I say."Exactly.
author: Victoria Schwab,  The Archived

quote: I'm telling you a lie in a vicious effort that you will repeat my lie over and over until it becomes true
author: Lady Gaga

quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There is beauty in truth, even if it's painful. Those who lie, twist life so that it looks tasty to the lazy, brilliant to the ignorant, and powerful to the weak. But lies only strengthen our defects. They don't teach anything, help anything, fix anything or cure anything. Nor do they develop one's character, one's mind, one's heart or one's soul.
author: José N. Harris

quote: Truth is beauty
author: Lisi Harrison

quote: One lie has the power to tarnish a thousand truths.
author: Al David

quote: You may lie with your mouth, but with the mouth you make as you do so you none the less tell the truth.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner

quote: But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: If you say that you never lie in life,you honestly insult my intelligence.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Every day is a lie. But you are dying. That is not a lie.
author: Cormac McCarthy,  The Road

quote: All I do is lie, and that has made me immune to compliments.
author: David Sedaris

quote: A lie was something you told because you were mean or a coward. A story was something you made up out of something that might have happened. Only you didn't tell it like it was, you told it like you thought it should have been.
author: Betty Smith,  A Tree Grows in Brooklyn

quote: Politics:Lies about the truth,or the truth about lies?
author: Silverwolf

quote: I guess sometimes you have to lie to find the truth.
author: Scott Westerfeld,  Extras

quote: Lies run sprints, but the truth runs marathons.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: You know there's no such thing as a complete lie. There's always some truth in there.
author: David Levithan,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Catalyst [10w] You're not lying if your lie helps engender the truth.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I never lie,"I said offhand. "At least not to those I don't love.
author: Anne Rice,  The Vampire Lestat

quote: A lie can run round the world before the truth has got its boots on.
author: Terry Pratchett,  The Truth

quote: It is an occupational hazard that anyone who has spent her life learning how to lie eventually becomes bad at telling the truth.
author: Ally Carter,  Heist Society

quote: There are three types of lies -- lies, damn lies, and statistics.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: the worst part about being lied to is knowing you werent worth the truth
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Initially, the truth may hurt, but lies hurt always.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A friend once said, and I found to be true,That everyday people, they lie to God too,So what makes you think, that they won't lie to you.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: Of all lies, art is the least untrue.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: A thing may happen and be a total lie; another thing may not happen and be truer than the truth.
author: Tim O'Brien,  The Things They Carried

quote: And remember that within every lie, there is a truth hidden. Know the truth to defeat the lie.
author: T.A. Miles,  Raventide

quote: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
author: Stephanie Klein,  Straight Up and Dirty

quote: No one believes a liar even when he tells the truth
author: Aesop

quote: Little white lies are part of everyday life. If you're in court being charged with a felony, you're probably going to be tempted to lie. Or if your girlfriend asks you if the sweater she is wearing makes her look fat; you're going to lie because you love that person. There are different reasons and justifications to lie; it's human nature.
author: Monica Raymund

quote: Don’t spoil me with your lies, love me with your truth.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The truth is always an insult or a joke, lies are generally tastier. We love them. The nature of lies is to please. Truth has no concern for anyone's comfort
author: Katherine Dunn,  Geek Love

quote: A truth that's told with bad intentBeats all the lies you can invent.
author: William Blake,  Auguries of Innocence

quote: Sometimes, a lie is told in kindness. I don't believe it ever works kindly. The quick pain of truth can pass away, but the slow, eating agony of a lie is never lost.
author: John Steinbeck,  East of Eden

quote: I'd rather hear an ugly truth, rather than an obscure lie.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Truth builds trust.
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: Life is more or less a lie, but then again, that's exactly the way we want it to be.
author: Bob Dylan
